issuetype.description: A new feature of the product, which has yet to be developed.
issuetype.name: New Feature

resolution.description: Signifies completion of tasks, info requests, etc.
resolution.name: Completed

status.description: A resolution has been taken, and it is awaiting verification by reporter. From here issues are either reopened, or are closed.
status.name: Resolved

comments.body:
*Eucalyptus Version*

{{4.4.0-0.25788.147.20170202git6e5a63d.el7}}

*Steps*

# Create Eucalyptus VPC with multiple availability zones - [hspencer-400-maint-4.4|http://jenkins.qa1.eucalyptus-systems.com/job/Quick%20Launch%20Maint_4.4/400/]
{code}
[root@h-04 ~]# euca-describe-availability-zones --region euca-admin@
AVAILABILITYZONE	black-dollar	available
AVAILABILITYZONE	black-market	available
AVAILABILITYZONE	port-of-miami	available
{code}
# Create non-eucalyptus account (example {{developement-operations}}) via {{euare-accountcreate}}
# Bundle, upload and register Ubuntu Xenial HVM EMI:
{code}
[root@h-04 ~]# euca-describe-images --region devops-admin@
IMAGE	emi-63ef779d	ubuntu-xenial-x86_64-hvm-20170203/xenial-server-cloudimg-amd64-disk1.raw.manifest.xml	000727120439	available	public	x86_64	machine			instance-store	hvm
{code}
# Using linked {{cfn-fn-sub-full-stack-example-template.json}} template, which contains {{Fn::Sub}} functions, create a stack:
{code}
$ grep "Fn::Sub" cfn-fn-sub-full-stack-example-template.json
                                                      { "Fn::Sub" : "/usr/local/bin/cfn-signal -e 0 --stack ${AWS::StackName} --access-key ${CfnUserKey}" },
                                                      { "Fn::Sub" : [ " --secret-key ${SecretKey}", { "SecretKey": { "Fn::GetAtt": ["CfnUserKey", "SecretAccessKey"] } }]},
                                                      { "Fn::Sub" : " --url ${EndPoint}" },
                                                      { "Fn::Sub" : " --region ${AWS::Region}\n" }
                        "Fn::Sub" : "AccountId: ${AWS::AccountId} ${!S3LoggingBucket}: ${S3LoggingBucket}"

[root@h-04 ~]# euform-create-stack CfnSubTest --template-file cfn-fn-sub-full-stack-example-template.json --capabilities CAPABILITY_IAM --parameter ImageId=emi-63ef779d --parameter KeyName=devops-admin --parameter EndPoint=http://cloudformation.e-32.autoqa.qa1.eucalyptus-systems.com:8773/ --parameter MinSize=3 --parameter MaxSize=6 --region devops-admin@
arn:aws:cloudformation::000727120439:stack/CfnSubTest/9c9b6b65-2a33-4b6d-890d-df5d4572db7b
[root@h-04 ~]# euform-describe-stacks --region devops-admin@
STACK	CfnSubTest	CREATE_COMPLETE		CloudFormation template to launch a highly available Nginx web stack with ELB access logging in Eucalyptus VPC	2017-02-16T17:35:29.538Z
PARAMETER	ImageId		emi-63ef779d
PARAMETER	KeyName		devops-admin
PARAMETER	EndPoint		http://cloudformation.e-32.autoqa.qa1.eucalyptus-systems.com:8773/
PARAMETER	InstanceType		m1.medium
PARAMETER	MinSize		3
PARAMETER	MaxSize		6
OUTPUT	AccessLogBucket	AccountId: 000727120439 ${S3LoggingBucket}: cfnsubtest-s3loggingbucket-j26tdzg6vyqsw
OUTPUT	ELBURL	http://CfnSubTes-NginxELB-YRFAZJB4EP86Y-000727120439.lb.e-32.autoqa.qa1.eucalyptus-systems.com
{code}
# Look at one of the ASG instance's console output to confirm user data script contained correct information:
{code}
[root@h-04 ~]# eulb-describe-lbs --region devops-admin@
LOAD_BALANCER	CfnSubTes-NginxELB-YRFAZJB4EP86Y	CfnSubTes-NginxELB-YRFAZJB4EP86Y-000727120439.lb.e-32.autoqa.qa1.eucalyptus-systems.com	2017-02-16T17:35:37.019Z	internet-facing
[root@h-04 ~]# eulb-describe-instance-health CfnSubTes-NginxELB-YRFAZJB4EP86Y --region devops-admin@
INSTANCE	i-896baa36	InService
INSTANCE	i-a1be2ec6	InService
INSTANCE	i-8cc2e9b5	InService

[root@h-04 ~]# euca-get-console-output i-896baa36 --region devops-admin@
i-896baa36

7483] pci_hotplug: PCI Hot Plug PCI Core version: 0.5
[    2.118132] pciehp: PCI Express Hot Plug Controller Driver version: 0.4
[    2.119001] input: Power Button as /devices/LNXSYSTM:00/LNXPWRBN:00/input/input0
[    2.119842] ACPI: Power Button [PWRF]
[    2.120385] GHES: HEST is not enabled!
[    2.137936] ACPI: PCI Interrupt Link [LNKB] enabled at IRQ 10
.....
[   91.468330] cloud-init[1317]: Finished processing dependencies for aws-cfn-bootstrap==1.4
[   91.496672] cloud-init[1317]: + /usr/local/bin/cfn-signal -e 0 --stack CfnSubTest --access-key AKIAAKA3L7CNBD5U6XDA --secret-key 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 --resource AutoScalingGroup --url http://cloudformation.e-32.autoqa.qa1.eucalyptus-systems.com:8773/ --region eucalyptus
ci-info: ++++++++++++++++++++Authorized keys from /home/ubuntu/.ssh/authorized_keys for user ubuntu++++++++++++++++++++
...
{code}
